Docs.param: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.
Optional, used to expand the properties within share's properties. Valid values are: stats. Should be passed as a string with delimiter ','.
Optional, used to retrieve properties of a snapshot.
A token to allow the caller to cancel the call to the service. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Tries to get details for this resource from the service.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.ResourceManager.Storage.Models.FileShareCreateOperation CreateOrUpdate(string shareName, class Azure.ResourceManager.Storage.FileShareData fileShare, string expand, bool waitForCompletion, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Public Overridable Function CreateOrUpdate (shareName As String, fileShare As FileShareData, Optional expand As String = Nothing, Optional waitForCompletion As Boolean = true, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As FileShareCreateOperation

Docs.param: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.
Properties of the file share to create.
Optional, used to expand the properties within share's properties. Valid values are: snapshots. Should be passed as a string with delimiter ','.
Waits for the completion of the long running operations.
The cancellation token to use.
Docs.summary: Creates a new share under the specified account as described by request body. The share resource includes metadata and properties for that share. It does not include a list of the files contained by the share.
